hooks.prompt: A source file was modified. If this was a .cs file in the src/ or tests/ directory, consider running relevant tests with 'dotnet test' to verify the change doesn't break existing functionality. For TDD workflow, ensure tests are run after each RED, GREEN, and REFACTOR phase.

Remember to follow TDD principles (RED-GREEN-REFACTOR) and ensure code adheres to SOLID, DRY, KISS, YAGNI, and CQS principles. Available commands: /dotnet-tdd:tdd, /dotnet-tdd:red, /dotnet-tdd:green, /dotnet-tdd:refactor, /dotnet-tdd:review
